name: Atari Games
info:
• 简体中文名: 雅达利游戏
  • 别名: Atari Games Corporation
detail:
Atari Games Corporation was an American producer of arcade games, and originally part of Atari, Inc.
本公司是曾代表美国电子游戏业，又因大量发行粗制滥造的游戏，将业界带入毁灭的Atari公司的尸体。

works.name: RollerCoaster Tycoon Adventures / 过山车大亨：冒险
Icewind Dale: Enhanced Edition / 冰风谷：增强版
Baldur's Gate II: Enhanced Edition / 博德之门2：增强版
Baldur's Gate:Enhanced Edition / 博德之门：增强版
